life.threedee.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • life.threedee.Camera
              • life.threedee.game.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Tickable

    public class Player
extends Camera
implements Tickable
    A player, extends Camera and has some extra additions to represent the fact that it is part of the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Game g,
      GameMap m)
        The "default" player constructor. Calls the camera constructor with the default player location and orientation.
        Parameters:
        g - The game that the player will read input from.
        m - The map that contains information in the game.
